edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserAnswers

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserAnswers
    The User object takes actions and retains data for a specific user session User_DB_Connection is User's interface to Data_Bank (encapsulates user-specific AND database-specific calls).

      • getMyDataBank

        Returns:
        UserDBConnection.

      • readAndAdvancePage

        public void readAndAdvancePage(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,?> params,
                      boolean advance)
        Assembles values submitted (in http request params), advance page, store values in DataBank.
        Parameters:
        params - HashTable which contains the questions and corresponding answers.
        advance - Should the survey be advanced to next page or not.

      • setInterrupt

        public void setInterrupt()
        Sets the user state in the data base as interrupted and closes the current session. Also sends an interrupted email to the user.

      • setDone

        public void setDone()
        Sets variables when done with survey, but if forwarding, hold off setting exercise as complete for invite purposes.

      • setComplete

        public void setComplete()
        Sets user's state as "completed" in database. Also sends a completed message. If forwarding, needs to be set by callback from app forwarded to.

      • getData

        public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getData()
        Returns all current data that the user has stored so far.
        Returns:
        Hashtable The data stored in the database as a hashtable.

        public java.lang.Integer getFieldValue(java.lang.String fieldName)

        Specified by:
        getFieldValue in interface UserAnswers
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Name of the field whose value is needed.
        Returns:
        Integer Value of the fieldName, null is returned if no value is present.

        public java.lang.String getJSValues()

        Specified by:
        getJSValues in interface UserAnswers
        Returns:

        public void startSurveySession(java.lang.String browserUseragent,
                      java.lang.String ipAddress)
        create user's survey session and capture the IP address of the user
        Parameters:
        browserUseragent - User browser's User Agent.
        ipAddress - Ip address of the user's machine from where he is accessing the survey.

      • recordDeclineHit

        public void recordDeclineHit(java.lang.String msgId,
                    java.lang.String studyId)
        Records that the decline form was hit form the invitation decline link
        Parameters:
        msgId - Message id that the user used to access the system.
        studyId - Survey Id that the user declined.
